metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20683 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: commands/rsync in Gitolite before 3.6.11, if .gitolite.rc enables rsync, mishandles the rsync command line, which allows attackers to have a "bad" impact by triggering use of an option other than -v, -n, -q, or -P.

criterions.comment: gitolite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
gitolite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
